backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining state for users, episodes, characters, clans, gallery items, news, scripts, and ProBlocks with admin‑protected update APIs and presentation editing.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing donation section, navigation update, and App integration with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing styling, features, hooks, and component behavior.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS variables and theming definitions for light and dark modes plus global background and border setup.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML skeleton containing the app mount point and script loader for the React frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing between main, admin, and pro views and rendering all public sections including the DonationSection before the footer.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Gate component that checks identity and admin status to show loading, login, unauthorized message, or the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Renders the admin dashboard with navigation, authentication, and tabbed panels for managing all content types. Handles routing via URL hash changes and conditionally shows the Team tab for admins.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cha: Provides CRUD UI for characters, including metadata encoding/decoding and clan selection. Manages form dialogs, validation, and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cla: Implements create, edit, and delete functionality for clans with metadata handling. Includes form dialogs, validation, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Epi: Handles episode creation, editing, deletion, ordering, and thumbnail upload/validation. Supports tagging characters, visibility modes, and production checklist fields.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Gal: Manages gallery items with image upload/processing, metadata encoding, and CRUD dialogs. Provides form validation and editing for descriptions and categories.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/New: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting news posts using query hooks and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Scr: Admin panel to manage scripts with create, edit, and delete flows including permission error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Tea: Interface for admins to assign and revoke user roles, view team members, and validate principals.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/characters/Chara: Displays a character's portrait, clan styling, and details with animations and error fallback.
frontend/src/components/characters/Creat: Dialog to create a new character, encode metadata, and submit via mutation with basic validation.
Renders a styled badge showing a clan's name and accent color with optional motion effects.
frontend/src/components/clans/ClanCard.t: Animated clan info card showing sigil, badge, and description with motion-aware effects.
frontend/src/components/episodes/Episode: Displays episode number, title, status, summary, and optional watch button.
Dialog that plays an episode video or shows an unavailable alert.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryG: Gallery grid with optional category tabs and clickable images that trigger a callback.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Lightbox dialog for viewing gallery images with navigation and keyboard controls.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryU: Dialog for uploading and validating gallery images with metadata and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/news/NewPostForm: Form for creating news posts with validation, error display, and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsPostCar: Card showing a news post’s title, author, timestamp, and content.
Checks admin authentication and renders children only for authorized users, otherwise redirects out of Pro mode.
frontend/src/components/pro/proPresentat: Encodes and decodes Pro presentation blocks to and from JSON with basic validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/pro/ProPresentat: Loads, displays, and edits Pro presentation blocks with animations and conditional Pro-mode behavior.
frontend/src/components/pro/proPresentat: Zustand store managing Pro presentation blocks including add, update, remove, and ensuring a default block.
Defines TypeScript interfaces for Pro presentation blocks and documents.
frontend/src/components/pro/ProToolbar.t: Provides controls to add blocks and save Pro presentation changes, handling success, errors, and unauthorized states.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an animated story section with feature cards using reveal-on-scroll effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/Charact: Fetches and displays character cards, supports admin creation, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/sections/ClansSe: Displays clan cards using backend or fallback data, with animations, error handling, and an integrated world map.
frontend/src/components/sections/Donatio: Animated donation section with Cash App details and styled content card using scroll reveal.
frontend/src/components/sections/Episode: Fetches and decodes episode data, displays episode cards with loading and error states, and opens a player dialog.
Footer with brand info, quick navigation links, social icons, and scroll reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Loads gallery items with admin upload support, displays grid, handles lightbox interaction, and falls back to static data.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeaderN: Responsive navigation bar with scroll detection, smooth section scrolling, mobile menu, and admin link.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with parallax background, particle effects, animated gradients, and prominent title content.
frontend/src/components/sections/NewsUpd: Displays news posts with admin creation, user login, and profile setup, using hooks for fetching and animating content.
frontend/src/components/sections/WorldMa: Renders interactive SVG hotspot regions on the world map and forwards refs for click and keyboard activation.
Shows a dialog with detailed lore for a selected map location, including its name, region, and text.
Combines the world map image, hotspot overlay, and lore dialog to allow users to explore regions and view descriptions.
frontend/src/data/characters.ts: Defines character data, including clans, personalities, abilities, and roles for various story characters.
frontend/src/data/clans.ts: Provides metadata for each clan such as descriptions, colors, and sigil paths.
frontend/src/data/episodes.ts: Lists Season 1 episodes with titles, summaries, release status, and optional media fields.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Defines gallery item structure and category list, currently with an empty gallery array.
frontend/src/data/worldMapLocations.ts: Defines the WorldMapLocation interface and a list of map location objects with coordinates, metadata, lore, and SVG shapes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor via React Query, updating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, logout, stored identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Implements a hook that applies a scroll-based parallax transform to an element with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting and updates in response to system changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for profiles, roles, episodes, and other application data operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Provides an IntersectionObserver-based hook that reveals elements when they enter the viewport, respecting reduced‑motion settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers plus custom color variables and various anime-style visual effects and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Provides encode/decode helpers for embedding metadata in text fields and utilities for retrieving clan styling from static data.
frontend/src/utils/galleryImageUpload.ts: Validates uploaded images by type and size, converts them to data URLs, and exposes size limits for gallery, episodes, and characters.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and admin token persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme with custom colors, clan palettes, shadows, and plugin extensions for typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for the anime site build.
